table.name: vtiger_clientaccount
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_clientaccount` ( `clientaccountid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`clientaccountid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_clientaccountcf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_clientaccountcf` ( `clientaccountid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`clientaccountid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
